34.plot: A couple try to overcome their trust issues and repair their damaged relationship.

1.title: Busted! You Wanna Be Me
1.plot: In the series premiere, celebrity chef Robert Irvine intervenes between two friends, whose rivalry threatens their friendship.

2.title: If You Fail the Test, Our Friendship Is Over
2.plot: Robert tries to mend a 40-year-old friendship, broken by accusations of stealing.

3.title: I Married a Con Man
3.plot: A man finds out he was scammed by his much younger husband.

4.title: Lose the Drugs or Lose Me
4.plot: Robert attempts to help a man who has been battling drugs and alcohol, since his teenage years.

5.title: My Wife Is Older Than My Mom
5.plot: Robert tries to understand the attraction between an 18-year-old man and his 71-year-old wife.

6.title: I'm So Desperate for a Baby
6.plot: Robert meets a man who helped conceive 22 children, by being a sperm donor to women desperate to have babies.

7.title: It's Your Fault We Lost Our Baby
7.plot: A man, who sleeps next to his still-born baby's ashes, needs to grieve the tragedy of his still-born baby and stop blaming his wife.

8.title: My Sister Was Impregnated by My Husband
8.plot: Robert intervenes between two sisters who haven't seen each other, after one had a child with the other's husband.

9.title: My Husband Fat Shames Me
9.plot: Robert encounters a man who belittles his wife to motivate her to lose weight.

10.title: My Wife Beats Me Up
10.plot: Robert sits down with a couple battling temper problems.

11.title: I Think My Daughter Is Sleeping with My Boyfriend
11.plot: Robert sits down with a mother who is concerned about her daughter's sexual activity.

12.title: I Want My Ex Back
12.plot: Robert helps a man who is infatuated with his ex, even though she married a different man and had a child with another.

13.title: You Left Me After My Tummy Tuck Surgery Went Wrong
13.plot: Robert encounters a woman who underwent a botched tummy tuck and blames it on her boyfriend's infidelity.

14.title: I Sell My Plasma to Support My Family
14.plot: Robert helps a woman who's trying to convince her partner to stop selling her plasma and kick a gambling habit.

15.title: I'm Stuck: I Never Wanted to Be a Mom
15.plot: A woman admits to her daughter that she never wanted to be a mother.

16.title: I've Gained 200 Pounds Since My Wedding
16.plot: Robert offers advice to a woman who has gained 200 pounds since her wedding day and fears her husband will leave if she can't shed the weight.

17.title: You Lied About Your Birth Control
17.plot: Robert sits down with a couple in conflict, after the wife lied to her husband about her birth control, leading to a fifth child for them.

18.title: Choose! It's Either Your Best Friend or Me
18.plot: Robert sits down with a woman who thinks her boyfriend might be more involved with his male best friend.

19.title: My Daughter Is an Unfit Mom
19.plot: A woman confronts her adult daughter, who has had a habit of leaving her family for months at a time.

20.title: You Stole from Our Mom on Her Deathbed
20.plot: Robert sits down with a family ripped apart by accusations of theft, with the conflict climaxing in a lie-detector test.

21.title: Our Adoption Ruined Our Relationship
21.plot: Robert encounters a couple struggling to stay together, after making a decision they now regret.

22.title: My Wife and I Haven't Had Sex in Seven Years
22.plot: Robert sits down with a couple in a sexless marriage, who want to get their love life back on track.

23.title: My Deadbeat Mom Has Never Met Her Grandkids
23.plot: Robert helps a woman trying to connect with her mother, after she abandoned her as a child.

24.title: I Want to Stop Selling My Body, But I Can't
24.plot: Robert helps a woman whose boyfriend wants her to sell her body to help with their finances.

25.title: My Broke Husband Is a Cheater
25.plot: A woman confronts her husband about his lack of support and accuses him of cheating.

26.title: I'll Move Back in If You Have Sex with Me
26.plot: Robert sits down with a couple who have been living apart, due to severe intimacy issues.

27.title: Help! I Put My 15-Year-Old on Probation
27.plot: Robert helps a mother with a teenage child, who has gotten out of control.

28.title: Surprise! You're Both My Side Piece
28.plot: A man caught in a love triangle reveals the truth to both of his lovers.

29.plot: A mother delivers an ultimate to her son.

30.title: You Call It Twerking... I Call It Cheating
30.plot: Flirtation and betrayal put a relationship in jeopardy.

31.plot: A woman confronts the man who took her children because he believed she was cheating.

32.plot: A woman believes her friend needs help getting away from drug use and sex work.

34.plot: A woman confronts her mother about her decision to work in the sex industry.

36.plot: After being separated for eight months, a husband returns to find his wife's ex-husband living with her.

37.plot: A woman discovers through social media that her boyfriend has been lying, and seeing another woman.

imdb.title: The Robert Irvine Show
plot: Chef Robert Irvine becomes talk show host Robert Irvine it's a conflict resolution talk show.::Raven Funderburg
